item.title: Review: Bang Gang's The Wolves Are Whispering (2015)
item.description: The following is a review of Bang Gang's 2015 album The Wolves Are Whispering.

item.title: Well done, Amazon (re: Amazon Cloud)
item.description: They've been saying for quite a while that music was heading towards the 'cloud,' and while it seemed for a while that everyone was betting on Apple doing it first, you've trumped them, with what seems like a very consumer-friendly service.

item.title: Favorite new (to me) music of 2010
item.description: Once again, I had the pleasue of purchasing a good deal of music in 2010. Here's a few lists of my favorites, of varying degrees, and disappointments, as well as a look back at changes from last year.

item.title: iTunes Playlists to Xml: Parsing categories with LINQ
item.description: LINQ to parse the XML export from iTunes Playlists to Xml for musical genres/categories.

item.title: Review: Nady Audio Stereo Headphones (HP-03)
item.description: Review of Nady Audio Stereo Headphones, HP-03 model.

item.title: Review: La Ballade Of Lady & Bird : A Project By Keren Ann Zeidel & Bardi Johannsson
item.description: Review of La Ballade Of Lady & Bird : A Project By Keren Ann Zeidel & Bardi Johannsson, by Lady & Bird.

item.title: Music Recommendations Please! version 0.5 beta
item.description: Version 0.5 beta of Music Recommendations Please! is now available for download.

item.title: Music application idea
item.description: A music application idea, that I'll be working on implementing.

item.title: Dead? The digital download is barely out of its teens
item.description: Before embracing the digital media cloud, please let us embrace the promise of digital media, first, by allowing users a selection that would otherwise be unavailable.

item.title: iTunes Playlists to Xml - version 1.6 released
item.description: Version 1.6 of iTunes Playlists to Xml has been released.

item.title: Favorite new (to me) music of 2009
item.description: I had the pleasue of purchasing a lot of music in 2009. Here's a few lists of my favorites, of varying degrees, and (thankfully few) disappointments.

item.title: iTunes Music to SQLite - version 0.1 beta released
item.description: iTunes Music to SQLite imports all 'Music' playlists in iTunes into a SQLite database.

item.title: Music Recommendations Please! - version 0.4.5 beta released
item.description: Music Recommendations Please! is an application that uses Last.fm and Yahoo! Music to get a listing of artists similar to those you've entered. Download version 0.4.5 beta.
